p: The optimized geometry of harpagide 5-O-β-D-glucopyranoside with the key interatomic distances in Angstrom are shown in Figure 3. The calculated broad peak at 3401 cm −1 is assigned to the O—H of the cyclopentane ring. The aromatic ring C = C and C—H stretching vibrations are assigned 1471 and 2851 cm −1 respectively. The C—O—C stretching vibrations are assigned the strong peaks at 1090. The calculated 1H-NMR spectrum for harpagide 5-O-β-D-glucopyranoside is presented in Table 2. Major hydrogen atoms are designated in the calculated 1H-NMR spectrum.
